price: Qur’aan yε Arab kasa, deε akyea biara nni mu, sεdeε wͻbεyε ahwεyie.
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
